Game.Name: Scooby-Doo! Unmasked
Game.Plot: Ruh-roh! Fred's cousin, Jed, is nowhere to be found! His animatronic monsters have gone haywire and are attacking everyone in sight! It's up to Scooby-Doo and Mystery, Inc. to stop the creepy costumed creatures, unmask the mystery, and find Jed before it's too late. Could Jed be prime suspect? Zoinks! Get me a Scooby-Snack! Features: Explore massive levels including the Harum Scare'em Museum, the Haunted Rockin' Roller Coaster, and get ready for a Shuddery Showdown in Chinatown. Collect and wear costumes that give Scooby special abilities such as a Kung Fu Scooby, Bat Scooby, and Robin Hood Scooby. Features the voice of Batman's Adam West and the Scooby-Doo cartoon voice actors. All-new game engine featuring "contour shading" that makes the game look just like the cartoon.
